description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党员，中华人民共和国政治人物及中国人民解放军上将。曾任中国人民解放军军事科学院院长、总高级步兵学校校长等职，参与长征、抗日战争、国共内战及朝鲜战争。
description.en: A member of the Communist Party of China, a politician of the People's Republic of China, and a general of the People's Liberation Army. He served as the President of the PLA Academy of Military Science and the head of the PLA General Senior Infantry School. He participated in the Long March, the Second Sino-Japanese War, the Chinese Civil War, and the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的著名军事学校。
description.en: A famous military academy during the Republic of China period.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1927年4月12日，由中国国民党发起的针对中国共产党的政治清洗事件。
description.en: A political purge of Communists initiated by the Kuomintang on April 12, 1927.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的战略性大撤退。
description.en: A strategic retreat by the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的部队之一。
description.en: One of the units of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的部队之一。
description.en: One of the units of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争时期，由中国共产党领导的常规军队。
description.en: A regular army led by the Communist Party of China during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

en: 4th Column of the Eighth Route Army

description.zh-cn: 八路军在抗日战争时期的一支部队，曾挺进冀东地区。
description.en: A unit of the Eighth Route Army during the Second Sino-Japanese War that advanced into the Eastern Hebei area.

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争期间在冀东地区发生的大规模武装起义。
description.en: A large-scale armed uprising in the East Hebei region during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在第二次国共内战时期的主力部队之一。
description.en: One of the main forces of the People's Liberation Army during the Second Chinese Civil War.

en: 10th Column of the East China Field Army

description.zh-cn: 华东野战军下属的一个纵队，以善于构筑防御工事和阻击战闻名。
description.en: A column under the East China Field Army, known for its expertise in building fortifications and fighting blocking actions.

en: 9th Army Group of the Third Field Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第三野战军下属的一个兵团，后改编为中国人民志愿军第九兵团参与朝鲜战争。
description.en: An army group under the PLA Third Field Army, later reorganized into the 9th Army Group of the People's Volunteer Army to participate in the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战期间，华东野战军在河南东部地区进行的一次大规模战役。
description.en: A large-scale campaign conducted by the East China Field Army in eastern Henan during the Second Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战时期，中国人民解放军与中华民国国军之间的一场决定性战役。
description.en: A decisive battle between the People's Liberation Army and the Republic of China Armed Forces during the Second Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战后期，中国人民解放军渡过长江，攻占南京及上海的战役。
description.en: A campaign during the later stages of the Second Chinese Civil War in which the People's Liberation Army crossed the Yangtze River and captured Nanjing and Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国与大韩民国之间的战争，中国人民志愿军参与其中。
description.en: A war between the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the Republic of Korea, in which the Chinese People's Volunteer Army participated.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜战争期间，中国人民志愿军与美国领导的联合国军在长津湖地区进行的一场战役。
description.en: A battle during the Korean War between the Chinese People's Volunteer Army and the US-led United Nations forces in the Chosin Reservoir area.

description.zh-cn: 美国海军陆战队历史最悠久、规模最大的现役师。
description.en: The oldest and largest active-duty division in the United States Marine Corps.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总高级步兵学校

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总高级步兵学校

description.zh-cn: 曾是中国人民解放军的一所高级军事院校。
description.en: A former senior military academy of the People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军军事科学院

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军军事科学院

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的最高军事科学研究机构。
description.en: The highest military science research institution of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾任中国人民志愿军司令员兼政治委员。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, who served as the Commander and Political Commissar of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾任中共中央副主席、国务院副总理、国防部长。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, who served as Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, Vice Premier of the State Council, and Minister of National Defense.

en: 1958 Enlarged Meeting of the Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 1958年由中共中央军委召开的一次扩大会议，会议期间对刘伯承、粟裕、萧克、李达等所谓的“教条主义”进行了批判。
description.en: An enlarged meeting held by the CPC Central Military Commission in 1958, during which individuals like Liu Bocheng, Su Yu, Xiao Ke, and Li Da were criticized for so-called "dogmatism".

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国历史上的一场重大政治运动。
description.en: A major political movement in the history of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾任中国人民解放军军事科学院首任院长。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, who served as the first President of the PLA Academy of Military Science.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，宋时轮的继任者，担任中国人民解放军军事科学院院长。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the People's Liberation Army, successor to Song Shilun as President of the PLA Academy of Military Science.

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在中国北京的一系列由学生领导的示威活动。
description.en: A series of student-led demonstrations in Beijing, China in 1989.

nodes.id: 戒严令 (1989年中华人民共和国)

zh-cn: 戒严令 (1989年中华人民共和国)
en: Martial Law Order (People's Republic of China, 1989)

description.zh-cn: 1989年六四事件期间，中华人民共和国政府在北京部分地区发布的戒严令。
description.en: The martial law order issued by the government of the People's Republic of China in parts of Beijing during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国湖南省的一个县，现为醴陵市。
description.en: A county in Hunan province, China, now Liling City.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的直辖市之一。
description.en: One of the municipalities of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 宋时轮的第三任妻子。
description.en: Song Shilun's third wife.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军二级上将，在淮海战役中兵败自杀。
description.en: A general of the Republic of China Army who was defeated and committed suicide during the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 四一二政变后，宋时轮因共产党嫌疑被捕入狱。
description.en: After the Shanghai massacre of 1927, Song Shilun was arrested and imprisoned on suspicion of being a Communist.

description.zh-cn: 宋时轮指挥的八路军第4纵队挺进冀东，配合并促成了冀东大暴动。
description.en: The 4th Column of the Eighth Route Army, commanded by Song Shilun, advanced into East Hebei, coordinating with and helping to bring about the East Hebei Insurrection.

description.zh-cn: 在豫东战役中，宋时轮指挥的第十纵队成功阻击了邱清泉兵团的增援。
description.en: During the East Henan Campaign, the 10th Column commanded by Song Shilun successfully blocked the reinforcements of Qiu Qingquan's army group.

description.zh-cn: 在淮海战役中，宋时轮参与指挥部队阻击国民党军对黄百韬兵团的增援，保障了围歼行动的胜利。
description.en: During the Huaihai Campaign, Song Shilun participated in commanding troops to block KMT reinforcements for Huang Baitao's army group, ensuring the victory of the encirclement and annihilation operation.

description.zh-cn: 宋时轮在朝鲜战争中指挥中国人民志愿军第九兵团参与长津湖战役。
description.en: During the Korean War, Song Shilun commanded the 9th Army Group of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army in the Battle of Chosin Reservoir.

description.zh-cn: 在长津湖战役中，宋时轮指挥的第九兵团与美国海军陆战队第1师等部队交战。
description.en: In the Battle of Chosin Reservoir, the 9th Army Group commanded by Song Shilun engaged in combat with the US 1st Marine Division and other units.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总高级步兵学校
中国人民解放军军事科学院

description.zh-cn: 在1958年军委扩大会议上，宋时轮受到彭德怀、林彪等人的批判。
description.en: At the 1958 enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission, Song Shilun was criticized by Peng Dehuai, Lin Biao, and others.

description.zh-cn: 在1958年军委扩大会议上，彭德怀批判了宋时轮。
description.en: At the 1958 enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission, Peng Dehuai criticized Song Shilun.

description.zh-cn: 在1958年军委扩大会议上，林彪批判了宋时轮。
description.en: At the 1958 enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission, Lin Biao criticized Song Shilun.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，宋时轮被造反派批判为“三反分子”。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Song Shilun was criticized by rebels as a "three-anti element".

position.zh-cn: 军事调处执行部中共方面执行处处长
position.en: Chief of the CPC Section of the Beiping Executive Headquarters

description.zh-cn: 在北平军事调处执行部，宋时轮协助中共代表叶剑英进行谈判。
description.en: At the Beiping Executive Headquarters, Song Shilun assisted CPC representative Ye Jianying in negotiations.

description.zh-cn: 1985年11月，郑文瀚接替宋时轮担任中国人民解放军军事科学院院长。
description.en: In November 1985, Zheng Wenhan succeeded Song Shilun as the President of the PLA Academy of Military Science.

relationships.target: 戒严令 (1989年中华人民共和国)

description.zh-cn: 在六四事件中，宋时轮反对出动军队实行戒严。
description.en: During the Tiananmen Square protests of 1989, Song Shilun opposed the deployment of the army to enforce martial law.

position.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军副司令员
position.en: Deputy Commander of the People's Volunteer Army

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜战争期间，宋时轮担任中国人民志愿军副司令员，在司令员彭德怀领导下作战。
description.en: During the Korean War, Song Shilun served as the Deputy Commander of the People's Volunteer Army, fighting under the command of Commander Peng Dehuai.
